ygData.subject: Re: Binding in Ogguk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had no problems being bound in Oggok when making the PoF run. The flute will disappear as quick as anything else would.  5 mins? I dunno, drop some
ygData.messageBody:
> I've been thinking that the next time I fight in Cazic I will get bound in
> Ogguk. Assuming no one picks it up and takes it, I plan on leaving a spare
> flute right at the zone so I can safely get back to Cazic without aggroing a
> guard. Key issue is how long will the flute stay on the ground before it
> decays?

I had no problems being bound in Oggok when making the PoF run.
The flute will disappear as quick as anything else would. 5 mins?
I dunno, drop some foraged grubs on the ground and start a timer.

Harmonic.
